com.github.rvesse.airline.restrictions

Interface ArgumentsRestriction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAllowedValuesRestriction, AbstractCommonRestriction, AbstractLocaleAndCaseStringRestriction, AbstractStringRestriction, AllowedEnumValuesRestriction, AllowedRawValuesRestriction, AllowedValuesRestriction, EndsWithRestriction, IsRequiredRestriction, LengthRestriction, None, NotBlankRestriction, NotEmptyRestriction, OccurrencesRestriction, PartialRestriction, PathRestriction, PatternRestriction, PortRestriction, PositiveNegativeRestriction, RangeRestriction, StartsWithRestriction

    public interface ArgumentsRestriction
    Represents restrictions on arguments
    Author:
    rvesse

      • finalValidate

        <T> void finalValidate(ParseState<T> state,
                       ArgumentsMetadata arguments)
        Method that is called after Airline has completed parsing

        This can be used to implement restrictions that require the final parser state to process

        Parameters:
        state - Parser state
        arguments - Arguments meta-data
